# Python SDK for cloudscale.ch

A Python3 library for [cloudscale.ch](https://www.cloudscale.ch).

## Install / Update

~~~shell
pip3 install cloudscale-sdk
~~~

## Development

### Run tests with coverage

~~~shell
tox -e coverage
~~~
